institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 20 (Education support for learning leaders, etc.)
contents: Article 20 (Training support for learning leaders, etc.) ① In order to effectively carry out the learning organization support project, the chairman may provide training for learning leaders, etc. of the supporting companies. ② Training for learning leaders, etc. may be provided through an external professional training institution. It can be selected and operated.
